name: in spirit (wawwawa)
description:
my long ass 21,000 word essay on klug rights only it's up to yo~u to reach that ending route whatever

anyway, this is my first twine game. if i get anymore ideas i'll definitely use this prorogram again. m sorry renpy but you're just not for me. 

and don't get me wrong, i /did/ polish this at least somehwat i just honestly don't care at this point with how long this is. this is the most words i ever poured into a project and after reading and rereading it a few times some parts really fucking hit good so it's blah at thsi point i just want to get it out there. if some endings look rushed then it's my bad :'yc

so yy  have fun reading this crazy shit. i hope it makes someone's day because i know it made mine ((sometimes) writing it

//oohoh and t.w. for...

* suicide
* depression
* self-harm (but more in vein of like sleep deprivation)
